INSERT INTO maintenance_order(maintenance_order_id, maintenance_order_sn, service_person_id, customer_name, maintainable, repairable, salesperson_name, received_date, product_name, product_sn, model, product_item_code, batch, order_sn, count, accessories, need_certificate, problem, state) VALUES (#{maintenanceOrderId}, #{maintenanceOrderSn}, #{servicePersonId}, #{customerName}, #{maintainable}, #{repairable}, #{salespersonName}, #{receivedDate}, #{productName}, #{productSn}, #{model}, #{productItemCode}, #{batch}, #{orderSn}, #{count}, #{accessories}, #{needCertificate}, #{problem}, #{state})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE maintenance_order_sn = #{maintenanceOrderSn}, customer_name = #{customerName}, maintainable = #{maintainable}, repairable = #{repairable}, salesperson_name = #{salespersonName}, received_date = #{receivedDate}, product_name = #{productName}, product_sn = #{productSn}, model = #{model}, product_item_code = #{productItemCode}, batch = #{batch}, order_sn = #{orderSn}, count = #{count}, accessories = #{accessories}, need_certificate = #{needCertificate}, problem = #{problem}
mapper.update: UPDATE maintenance_order SET state = #{state} WHERE maintenance_order_id = #{orderId}
